Body:
assert isinstance(sig, Message)
meta_data = SignalMetaData(origin=sig.meta_data.addressees[0] if sig.
    meta_data.addressees else 'Bot', addressees=[sig.meta_data.origin],
    response_to=sig.meta_data.identifier, sent_at=datetime.datetime.now(),
    room=sig.meta_data.room)
return Message(meta_data=meta_data, content='You said: %s' % sig.content)
